attributes.action: halt the erosion of civil liberties and rights
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Remove legislation that curtails our feedom to decide things that only affect ourselves; repeal legislation whose costs are out of all proportion with the tiny amount of risks they reduce; restore our legal safeguards: do not sacrifice the rights of British citizens on the alter of anti-terrorism legislation - you only allow the terrorists to win if you destroy the things that make this a good place to live in.

government_responses.details:
